posts.name: Jessica Smith
posts.cooked:
Welcome to the Weekly Roundup!

4/25/22 - 5/01/22
Issue - V100
Current Release: 1.9.0

Every week we’ll share community-driven apps and articles that were shared with us during the previous week as well as any major announcements from Streamlit. If there is anything we missed feel free to add it in a comment or @ us on Twitter!

  • = articles
  • = videos
  • = apps

Updates

  • Version 1.9.0 was released.
  • Read how Wissam brought his thoracic pathology detection work to life with Streamlit!

Featured Content

  • Streamlit Elements - Build draggable and resizable dashboards with Material UI, Nivo charts, and more! @okld
  • Generate Images with Your Voice Using DALL-E | Tutorial @patrickloeber
  • Create a Data Profiling App Using Pandas_Profiling and Streamlit

Tutorials/Introduction

  • Create and deploy a Cad to .stl converter: Streamlit and Python
  • Streamlit playlist @Rafat_Sarosh
  • Line Charts – Learning Line Charts with Streamlit
  • Streamlit Audio to Text Converter Web App | Complete Streamlit Python Course | Tutorial 5
  • Predicting Customer Satisfaction Using ZenML, MLFlow & Streamlit
  • 2# End to End House Price Prediction | Streamlit | Data Science Projects in Hindi
  • 3# End to End House Price Prediction PART-2| Streamlit | Data Science Projects in Hindi
  • 4 Easy Steps to Set up a Firestore Database for Your Streamlit Apps
  • How to make text in images on the harddrive searchable
  • Fourth ML project
  • آموزش کتابخانه streamlit پایتون فارسی - streamlit python library tutorial - خفن ترین کتابخانه پایتون
  • طراحی وبسایت و داشبورد ارز دیجیتال با کتابخانه streamlit پایتون فارسی - تو 10 دقیقه سایت بساز -#2
  • نحوه ساخت منو و سایدبار با کتابخانه streamlit پایتون - جلسه چهارم
  • Easily Build a Stock Sentiment App with Streamlit
  • Notionのアイコン画像を正方形に編集するWEBアプリケーションを作った
  • Beyond Train/test spilit with Streamlit
  • Streamlit と Mimesis で八百屋さん EC サイトを作ってみた
  • How we built a Stack Overflow Community questions analyzer (and you can too)
  • Streamlitインストール（簡単python アプリ作成）
  • AnacondaでStreamlitの環境を構築する

NLP and Language

  • ASKEY- SEO questions harvester @Alekseo
  • Sentiment Analysis Application
  • Answering Questions using BERT
  • NLP and ML App with Streamlit
  • Duplicate Question Pairs
  • Emoji Recommendation

Data Visualization

  • Products Dashboard

CV and Images

  • PicToSign
  • Hand Motion Detector using Mediapipe

Sports

  • NFL Mock Draft Databas @aaroncolesmith

Finance and Business

  • Banco Credicoop Dashboard
  • Stock Price Analysis
  • Numerai Dashboard
  • Bayes-AB-Viz @ymdpharm
  • SafeGraph Analytics Dashboard
  • Crypto Price App
  • Streamlit을 활용한 가계부 관리 Web Application 프로그램

Geography and Society

  • Kayak Project
  • Quake Forecaster
  • Food Carbon and Nutrition Tracking App (Python & Streamlit)

General

  • Movie Recommender System
  • H1B Case Status Analysis Streamlit Deployment

Model building and training

  • Auto ML
  • The Machine Learning Hyperparameter Optimization App · Streamlit

Cool happenings and other things

  • Holy Duck! Full Uber Pickups dataset with DuckDB + Pyarrow @gerardrbentley

Follow us

  • Twitter
